title: Common Star Types
alt: This article is about Eta Carinae, a luminous blue hypergiant with anomalous Fe[ii] emission spectra. For the 1998 Brad Bird film, see The Iron Giant (film).
transcript:
Common star typesYellow dwarf
Warm, stable, slowly-growingWhite dwarf
Small, hot, dimRed giant
Huge, cool, luminousRed dwarf
Small, cool, ancient, dimGreen elf
Old, diminishes into the westBlue giant
Large, hot, short-livedTeal sphynx
Cryptic, eternalGray wizard
Wise, powerful, mercurialIndigo banshee
Bright, portentous, extremely loudBeige gorgon
Dangerous to observe at optical wavelengths.
